text: Nia daangada ga helekai i nadau mehanga, “Gidaadou gaa hai tadau hai gi Jeremiah! Ma iai digau hai mee dabu i nia madagoaa huogodoo ga agoago mai laa gi gidaadou, ge iai digau kabemee labelaa i golo ga haga modongoohia mai gi gidaadou, mo nia soukohp labelaa i golo, ga hagadele mai labelaa gi gidaadou nnelekai a God. Gidaadou ga hai baahi ang gi Jeremiah ga hagalee hagalongo gi nnelekai a maa.”
